mapper.insert: insert into t_alter_bankinfo_his (ID, APP_ID, REPAY_ACCT_NO, REPAY_BANK_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_alter_bankinfo_his
ID,
APP_ID,
REPAY_ACCT_NO,
REPAY_BANK_ID,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_alter_bankinfo_his
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAY_ACCT_NO = #{repayAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAY_BANK_ID = #{repayBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.ID as id, a.APP_ID as appId, a.REPAY_ACCT_NO as repayAcctNo, a.REPAY_BANK_ID as repayBankId, b.BANK_NAME as bankName from t_alter_bankinfo_his a left join T_BANK_INFO b on a.REPAY_BANK_ID = b.id where a.APP_ID = #{appId}
select * from t_alter_bankinfo_his where APP_ID = #{appId} and REPAY_ACCT_NO = #{repayAcctNo}
